DOC.brief_summary: This study is multicentric, single-blind, and interventionnal with a randomization into two parallel arm, between a standard of care information and an additionnal information of the patient, with a 12 month follow up. The aim of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of a personalized information programm versus information provided from standard of care in patients taking Xarelto for Stroke Prevention in Atrial Fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Better Adherence With New Oral Anticoagulant in Atrial Fibrillation : Effectiveness of a Personalized Education Program
DOC.criteria: All patients treated with rivaroxaban chronically, (atrial fibrillation nonvalvular under current AMM) for less than one year whatever anti vitamin K treatment history Affiliate or beneficiary of a social security system.
